item.title: Setting up First Post
item.description: Personal notes on setting up non-essentials # 2 ways to check linux distr and version $ hostnamectl $ lsb_release -a # update package index $ sudo apt-get update # install git $ sudo apt-get install git $ sudo apt-get install vim # install pydf $ sudo apt-get install pydf # Install zsh and its plugin manager Antigen # install zsh $ sudo apt-get install zsh $ chsh -s $(which zsh) $ echo $SHELL # use curl to get latest Antigen, and get autojump on the side.
